from client.models.company import Company

from client.models.role import Role, Platform, UserRole
from client.models.user import S1User
from consts.common import SECRET_KEY
from consts.user import SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE, ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_DAYS, FOUNDER_NAME
from management.filters.user_filter import S1UserFilter
from management.management_permissions import UserManageListPermission
from management.serializers.roles import PermissionSerializer, RolesIdListSerializer
from management.serializers.user import (
    UserListCreateSerializer,
    UserDetailSerializer,
    UserDetailUpdateSerializer, AccountLoginSerializer, UserSimpleDetailSerializer
)

from utils.permission_menu import get_permission_menu



[文档]class ImageCodeView(APIView):
    authentication_classes = []  # 无需进行登录认证


[文档]    def get(self, request):
        """
        获取图片验证码码
        @param request:
        @return:
        """
        result = get_captcha(request)
        return Response(result)




[文档]class UsersListCreateAPI(ListCreateAPIView):
    """
    用户列表  创建用户
    """
    serializer_class = UserListCreateSerializer
    filterset_class = S1UserFilter
    pagination_class = MyPageNumberPagination
    permission_classes = [UserManageListPermission, ]


[文档]    def get_queryset(self):
        platform_id = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE).first().id
        user_ids = list(UserRole.objects.filter(
            role__platform_id=platform_id
        ).values_list(
            "s1_user_id", flat=True
        ).distinct())

        queryset = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(
            id__in=user_ids,
            is_deleted=False,
        ).order_by("-id")
        return queryset



[文档]    def create(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """
        重写创建函数
        @param request:
        @param args:
        @param kwargs:
        @return:
        """
        if self.request.user.root_s1_user_id == self.request.user.id:
            root_user_id = self.request.user.id
        else:
            # 如果不是根用户，那么ID用当前用户的根ID
            root_user_id = self.request.user.root_s1_user_id

        # 实例化序列化器
        serializer = self.get_serializer(
            data=request.data,
            context={
                "parent_user_id": self.request.user.id,
                "root_user_id": root_user_id,
                "re_password": request.data["re_password"]
            }
        )
        serializer.is_valid(raise_exception=True)
        self.perform_create(serializer)
        return Response(serializer.data)




[文档]class UsersDetailAPI(RetrieveUpdateAPIView):
    """
    用户详情
    编辑用户
    """
    queryset = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(is_deleted=False)
    serializer_class = UserDetailSerializer
    permission_classes = [UserManageListPermission, ]


[文档]    def retrieve(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        instance = self.get_object()
        serializer = self.get_serializer(instance)
        data = serializer.data
        data.pop("user_roles")
        # 获取属于客户端的角色

        platform = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE).only('id').first()
        roles = Role.objects.filter(
            platform_id=platform.id,
            userrole__s1_user_id=instance.id
        )
        role_serializer = RolesIdListSerializer(roles, many=True)
        role_list = [i["id"] for i in role_serializer.data]

        data["roles"] = role_list
        return Response(data)



[文档]    def update(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        instance = self.get_object()
        # 当前编辑的用户是否有创建者角色
        platform = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE).only('id').first()
        is_founder = UserRole.objects.filter(
            s1_user_id=instance.id,
            role__name=FOUNDER_NAME,
            role__platform_id=platform.id
        ).exists()

        # 如果当前登录用户不是创建者, 无法修改; 如果用户是创建者, 则无法修改角色和状态
        if is_founder:
            if not UserRole.objects.filter(
                s1_user_id=request.user.id,
                role__name=FOUNDER_NAME,
                role__platform_id=platform.id
            ).exists():
                raise APIException("当前用户权限不足! 无法修改!")
            request.data["is_active"] = instance.is_active
            request.data["role_ids"] = list(UserRole.objects.filter(
                s1_user_id=instance.id
            ).values_list("role_id", flat=True))
        request.data["username"] = instance.username
        serializer = UserDetailUpdateSerializer(instance, data=request.data)
        serializer.is_valid(raise_exception=True)
        self.perform_update(serializer)
        return Response({})




[文档]class UserStatusUpdateAPI(UpdateAPIView):
    """
    修改用户状态
    """
    queryset = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(is_deleted=False)
    permission_classes = [UserManageListPermission, ]


[文档]    def update(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        instance = self.get_object()
        user_ = request.user
        platform_id = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE).first().id
        # # 当前编辑的用户是否有创建者角色
        # is_founder = UserRole.objects.filter(
        #     s1_user_id=instance.id,
        #     role__name=FOUNDER_NAME,
        #     role__platform_id=platform_id
        # ).exists()
        # # 如果当前登录用户不是创建者, 无法修改.
        # if is_founder:
        if UserRole.objects.filter(
                s1_user_id=instance.id,
                role__name=FOUNDER_NAME,
                role__platform_id=platform_id
        ).exists():
            raise APIException("创建者角色无法被停用!")

        instance.is_active = request.data["is_active"]
        instance.save()
        return Response({"data": "修改成功"})




[文档]class LoginViewSet(APIView):
    authentication_classes = []


[文档]    def post(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        """
        登陆逻辑
        @param request:
        @return:
        """
        serializer = AccountLoginSerializer(data=request.data)
        serializer.is_valid(raise_exception=True)
        user = serializer.authenticate(serializer.data)
        if (not user.is_active) or user.is_deleted:
            raise APIException("账户被冻结，请联系管理员")
        # 校验图片验证码
        if not captcha_utils.check(serializer.data.get("cptch"), serializer.data.get("cptch_key")):
            raise APIException("图片验证码错误，请重新输入")

        is_scf_user = UserRole.objects.filter(s1_user_id=user.id)
        platform = Platform.objects.filter(name=serializer.data.get("source")).first()
        token = user_info_2_token({"user_id": user.id})
        resp = s1_application_open(token.decode("utf-8"))
        if resp.get("code") != status.HTTP_200_OK:
            raise AuthenticationFailed("无服务权限")

        # 如果用户来源是供应链金融管理端, 判断当前用户在供应链金融是否有角色
        if user.source == SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE:
            is_permission = is_had_permission(user.id, platform.id)
        # 如果是其他来源, 把token传过去.
        else:
            is_permission = is_had_permission(user.id, platform.id, token=token.decode())
        if not is_permission:
            raise APIException("此账号不可登陆")

        # 如果来源不是供应链金融后台, 在供应链金融也没有角色, 无法登录
        if user.source != SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE and not is_scf_user.exists():
            raise APIException("此账号不可登陆管理端")

        user.last_login = datetime.datetime.now()
        user.save()

        is_founder_user = is_scf_user.filter(role__name=FOUNDER_NAME).exists()
        # 获取全部权限
        if is_founder_user:
            res = get_permission_menu(platform, list())

        else:
            exist_app_menus = []
            # 查询用户对应的角色
            roles = UserRole.objects.filter(s1_user_id=user.id).values_list("role_id", flat=True)
            # 查询用户角色对应的菜单权限
            app_menus = RoleAppMenus.objects.filter(role_id__in=roles).values_list("app_menus_id", flat=True)
            # 查询出符合调价你的菜单权限
            selected_permission = AppMenus.objects.filter(id__in=app_menus, platform_id=platform)
            selected_permission_serializer = PermissionSerializer(selected_permission, many=True)
            # 把每个权限的code都取出来
            for i in selected_permission_serializer.data:
                exist_app_menus.extend(i["path"])
                exist_app_menus.append(i["code"])
            exist_app_menus = list(set(exist_app_menus))
            # 通过用户已有的所有的权限code中筛选出一级菜单权限
            selected_permission = AppMenus.objects.filter(code__in=exist_app_menus, path=list(), platform_id=platform)
            # 将一级菜单示例当做参数传入获取权限菜单的函数
            res = get_permission_menu(platform, exist_app_menus, first_menu_obj=selected_permission)
        user_data = UserSimpleDetailSerializer(user, context={'request': request}).data
        resp = {
            "nick_name": user_data.get("nick_name"),
            "username": user_data.get("username"),
            "icon": user_data.get("icon"),
            "phone": user_data.get("phone"),
            "token": token,
            "permissions": res,
        }
        return Response(resp)




[文档]class UserInfoRefreshAPIView(APIView):


[文档]    def get(self, request):
        """

        :param request:
        :return:
        """
        user = self.request.user
        # token = request.headers["Authorization"].split()[1]

        # resp = s1_application_open(token)
        # is_redirect = resp["data"].get("is_redirect", True)
        # if not is_redirect:
        #     raise AuthenticationFailed("无服务权限")

        platform_id = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE).first().id
        res = is_had_permission(user.id, platform_id)
        if not res:
            raise APIException("认证失败")
        # 查询到当前用户的root用户id
        root_user = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").get(pk=user.id).root_s1_user_id
        # 用当前用户的root用户去查询企业是否存在
        is_company_user = Company.objects.using("credible_data").filter(
            pk=scf_config["company"],
            s1_user_id=root_user
        ).exists()

        if not is_company_user:
            raise APIException("没有权限")
        token = user_info_2_token({"user_id": user.id}, expire_days=ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_DAYS)
        permissions = get_permission_menu(platform_id, list())
        resp = {
            "token": token,
            "username": user.username,
            "nick_name": user.nick_name,
            "email": user.email,
            "phone": user.phone,
            "icon": user.icon,
            "permissions": permissions
        }
        return Response(resp)




[文档]class RedirectRoles(APIView):
    authentication_classes = []


[文档]    def get(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        token = request.headers.get("token")
        secret_key = des_decrypt(token)
        if not secret_key == SECRET_KEY:
            return Response({"data": list()})
        platform_id = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE).first().id
        users = UserRole.objects.filter(
            role__platform=platform_id,
        ).values_list(
            "s1_user_id", flat=True,
        ).distinct()
        return Response({"data": list(users)})
